desc: Lava bags are microwavable heating pads filled with ultra-rare lava sand. Most heating pads are filled with food like rice, flaxseed and beans which rots and molds over time causing bad smells. Lavabags are all handcrafted in Utah, USA.

layout.text:
The Only Weighted Heating/Cooling Pads Filled With Lava Sand (Not Food)
Hand Made In Utah, USA.
